publications: [{"title":"Dubai expo, india pavilion welcomes country chicken co","subtitle":"Newsletter","date":"March 27, 2022","description":"Country Chicken Co has become the first meat company from India to present at the Expo 2020 Dubai. The Hyderabad-based company sells five different kinds of 'Naatu Kodi' (country chicken) in partnership with various farmers across Telangana and other states.Country Chicken Co. Founder Hemambar Reddy, CEO Saikesh, Chief Operating Officer Moh Sami, and Chief Strategist Officer Abhishek Patawar presented their business model to various investors from across the world on 24 March in Elevate XIX organized by the General Consulate of India. Country Chicken Co has set up a stall in the Indian Pavillion. On 26 March, they were given a whole day to be featured as an upcoming start-up as part of the India Innovation Startup Bus."},{"title":"Country chicken co‚Äôs first outlet","subtitle":"Zeenews","date":"February 15, 2022","description":"Online country chicken co"},{"title":"About country chicken co","subtitle":"Business India focus","date":"February 13, 2022","description":"Introduction to country chicken co"},{"title":"Country chicken co‚Äôs first store launch","subtitle":"Namaste Telangana","date":"February 12, 2022","description":"A brief intro about country chicken co"}]
